Room.Name: West Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the northern-most end of the West Hallway in the Kista Towers.
Room.LongDescription: The long hallway is drapped in blue velvet cloth covering up much of the walls, providing an outstanding backdrop for some large pictures of the early stages of the building of the Towers. The hallway continues to the south. There is a small, wooden door on the west wall.
